revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== Variant of {{m|en|Jaffe}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Yaffes}} # {{surname|en|from=Hebrew}}. ====Statistics==== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yaffe'' is the 29447<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 802 individuals. ''Yaffe'' is most common among White (94.26%) individuals. ===Further reading=== * {{R:en:DAFN}}
